players.name: Alice
memory: You: " I am innocent and saw Bob with the detective last night."

Charlie: "I am the detective and found Alice to be the mafioso. 
I will vote for Bob as he was seen with the detective last night and is a likely suspect."
Diana: "I am innocent and saw Bob with the detective last night. I believe Charlie is the detective, as he claimed to be and said Alice was the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the detective and have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. I will continue to protect my fellow mafia members and eliminate any threats."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
